{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07806v1", "title": "On Variations of s-invariants from sl(3)-link homology", "summary": "We use the Mackaay-Vaz universal $sl(3)$-link homology to deepen the study of
$s$-invariants on Khovanov's link homology associated to $sl(3)$. Such
$s$-invariants have already been studied by Lobb and Wu in characteristic 0 and
we show how to extend this to other characteristics, particularly to $p=3$. We
also use Bar-Natan's scanning algorithm for efficient calculations of these
invariants, and exhibit more examples of unusual behaviour that has been
previously observed by Lewark-Lobb.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT", "published": "2025-04-10T14:43:13Z"}
